body_html:
I'm really intrigued by this PR, it would be awesome to get the full suite of TensorBoard testing working in opensource/bazel as well as internally.

Right now we use screendiff testing internally, but don't have a way to run them externally; it would be great if we could. But, the internal infra takes care of the environment sensitivity you mention; not sure how we would solve that externally.

We also should not include the goldens in the TensorFlow repo since it would bloat the git history for everyone, so we would need to setup another repo and depend on it... which would create another level of indirection and possibility of de-synchronization :/

I set up a meeting to chat offline about this all in more depth.
